<template>
    <v-container class="bg-surface-variant">
        <v-row>
            <!-- <v-col cols="12"><v-text-field label="Value" variant="solo" v-model="Value"></v-text-field></v-col> -->
            <input type="text" :value="value" @input="$emit('input', $event.target.value)" />

            <v-col><v-text-field label="=" variant="solo" v-model="Ans" disabled>{{ Ans }}</v-text-field></v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row >

            <v-col cols="3"><v-btn>0</v-btn></v-col>
            <v-col cols="3"><v-btn color="green" v-on:click="Equals">=</v-btn></v-col>
            <v-col cols="3"><v-btn>/</v-btn></v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>
